participant_abstract.sent: Each participant presented his opinions or studies about the way the remote control should be designed.
The user interface designer emphasized the fact that the remote control needs to be elegant and easy to use (similarly to Google).

The industrial designer proposed to use infrared technology to meet the cost reqirements, and I presented a user study showing that the user wants a fancy and simple remote control with a minimum number of buttons.
Baba's wired remote control did not make the overall agreement, while the yellowish design proposed by the project manager did.

participant_decisions.sent: Yellow remote control with logo. infrared technology.
A few buttons*. simple to use*. fancy design*
